name: Anesthesia Machine
specifications: Free-standing or portable unit including flowmeters, vaporizers, breathing system, ventilator, and monitors; stainless steel and composite materials; typically 50â€“150 kg.
function: Delivers controlled mixtures of anesthetic gases and oxygen to patients during surgical procedures.
usage: Wear PPE (mask, gloves); check cylinder gases and connections; set gas flow and vaporizer; monitor the patient and alarms continuously throughout the procedure.
maintenance: Perform daily function checks; ensure all connections are secure; follow cleaning and disinfection procedures for reusable parts after each use.
warning: Failure to check for leaks, neglecting equipment calibration, or incorrect vaporizer settings.
